pages.title: Molten Materials
pages.text: Most metals and gems can be melted liquid form.$(br2)Ores, ingots, gems, and items and blocks made from them can be melted for resources. $(br2)It is an alternate way to store and manage resources, and some recipes require the materials in their liquid form.
To start melting, craft a Basin Foundry Lid, and place it on top of a heated basin.$(br2)Some materials require regular heating, and others superheating.

pages.title: More Melting Methods
pages.text: Basin Melting can melt the biggest number of things.$(br2)Seared Stone Smelteries can also melt many things, and can reclaim materials in some ways Basin Melting cannot.$(br2)In general, either way yields similar resource amounts.

pages.title: Seared Smelting Guide
pages.text: For more information about this alternative melting method, craft a Puny Smelting book.
